SEARCH
Package com.streamline.audio

Class AudioPlayer

java.lang.Object
com.streamline.audio.AudioPlayer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public final class AudioPlayer extends Object implements Runnable
Implementation of AbstractMusicQueue that handles audio playback functionality. This class is responsible for actually playing the audio from Song objects.
Author:
wellatleastitried

    • playCurrent

      public void playCurrent()

    • checkDownloadIntegrity

      public boolean checkDownloadIntegrity(Song song)
      Verifies file hash of the queued song with the hash that was generated when the file was created. This ensures that files that have been tampered with cannot be used.
      Parameters:
      song - The song to verify
      Returns:
      True if the file hash matches the stored hash

    • playSongFromFile

      public void playSongFromFile(String pathToAudio) throws UnsupportedAudioFileException, IOException, LineUnavailableException
      Stream the audio from the given file path.
      Parameters:
      pathToAudio - The file path of the audio file
      Throws:
      UnsupportedAudioFileException - If the file is not a supported audio format
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs
      LineUnavailableException - If the audio line cannot be opened

    • playSongFromUrl

      public void playSongFromUrl(String pathToAudio) throws Exception
      Stream the audio from the given URL.
      Parameters:
      pathToAudio - The URL that points to the audio stream
      Throws:
      Exception - If any error occurs during playback

      Parameters:
